title: Dutch Newspaper on Treaty of Versailles MCQ 3

content.question: Which of the following true statements about the Netherlands best explains how the newspaper’s national origin likely influenced the view of Germany expressed in the editorial?

choices.label: The Netherlands, by remaining neutral during the war, profited significantly from helping Germany evade the Entente’s naval blockade.
The Netherlands, like Germany before the war, had a significant overseas empire.
The Netherlands, like Germany, had a large merchant fleet.
The Netherlands, like Germany until 1918, was a constitutional monarchy, although the Dutch monarchs had less effective power than the German kaiser.

content.answer: The Netherlands, by remaining neutral during the war, profited significantly from helping Germany evade the Entente’s naval blockade.

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Explain the significance of a source's point of view, purpose, historical situation, and/or audience, including how these might limit the use(s) of a source.
